timeline.bodyText: stet. These should be '>' per the Google HTML style guide
timeline.author: elharo
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -62,11 +62,12 @@ new release is available on Maven Central.
 * Manually edit and update any pom.xml files in https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/java-docs-samples that dependabot missed
     * Go to go/java-live
     * Sort by title
-    * Scroll down until you find the section with titles "chore(deps): update dependency com.google.cloud:libraries-bom to v<version>"
-   * Approve and merge these PRs.
+    * Scroll down until you find the section with titles "chore(deps): update dependency com.google.cloud:libraries-bom to v<version>"
+    * Approve and merge these PRs.
+      For PRs waiting for Kokoro jobs, add the "kokoro:force-run" label.
 * In google3 run:
     * `$ g4d -f bom`
-    *  `/google/src/head/depot/google3/devtools/scripts/replace_string "<version>oldVersion</version>" "<version>newVersion</version>"`
+    *  `/google/src/head/depot/google3/devtools/scripts/replace_string "<version>oldVersion</version>" "<version>newVersion</version>"`

replies.bodyText: Until we can convince the owner to follow the Google HTML style, shall we follow the owner's guide to use >? Otherwise I cannot use this command from this document to create CLs to them.
replies.author: suztomo

replies.bodyText: There are many documents and many owners, who do not always agree. One purpose of the style guide is to resolve these disagreements once and for all rather than switching back and forth in every other cl to satisfy the individual preference of the reviewer.
replies.author: elharo

replies.bodyText: I see the latest CL by you fixed this. Reverted this line.
replies.author: suztomo

timeline.bodyText: > is in line with the other parts of these documents and the owner prefers the consistency.
timeline.author: suztomo

     * Sort by title
-    * Scroll down until you find the section with titles "chore(deps): update dependency com.google.cloud:libraries-bom to v<version>"
-   * Approve and merge these PRs.
+    * Scroll down until you find the section with titles "chore(deps): update dependency com.google.cloud:libraries-bom to v<version>"
+    * Approve and merge these PRs.
+      For PRs waiting for Kokoro jobs, add the "kokoro:force-run" label.
 * In google3 run:
     * `$ g4d -f bom`
-    *  `/google/src/head/depot/google3/devtools/scripts/replace_string "<version>oldVersion</version>" "<version>newVersion</version>"`
+    *  `/google/src/head/depot/google3/devtools/scripts/replace_string "<version>oldVersion</version>" "<version>newVersion</version>"`
